original_text:
And the Lord said to Moses, “Behold, I am coming to you in a thick cloud, that the people may hear when I speak with you, and may also believe you forever.”
When Moses told the words of the people to the Lord,
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 내가 빽빽한 구름 가운데서 네게 임함은 내가 너와 말하는 것을 백성들이 듣게 하며 또한 너를 영영히 믿게 하려 함이니라 모세가 백성의 말을 여호와께 아뢰었으므로

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Moses,
I am coming to you in a thick cloud,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 짙은 구름 가운데 네게 임하리니,

sentences.original_text: and may also believe you forever.”
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 영원히 너를 믿게 하려 함이라.”

sentences.original_text: When Moses told the words of the people to the Lord,
